author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary: ...DEXTER STRENGTHENS WHILE MOVING EAST-NORTHEASTWARD... As of 5:00 AM AST Wed Aug 06 the center of Dexter was located near 39.4, -59.9 with movement ENE at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEXTER STRENGTHENS WHILE MOVING EAST-NORTHEASTWARD... As of 5:00 AM AST Wed Aug 06 the center of Dexter was located near 39.4, -59.9 with movement ENE at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Dexter (AT4/AL042025)
